name: Jacob's Ladder (qzar24)
description:
Made for the SGDC Winter Game Jam. 

You are Jacob. You are a lowly orphan farm boy who dreams of adventure on the high seas leading your crew of fierce pirates and scalawags. You dream of becoming a pirate Lord. 

Fight and steal your way to becoming a reputable pirate as you climb the ladder of tiers to becoming a pirate lord. Fight on the open seas against the navy and enemy pirates or raid villages to score gold and treasure. 

Or just sail the open seas singing and dancing on the deck of the ship. 

It's your journey; climb on.
